definition[0]: a large shiny black bird with a loud cry
definition[1]: the loud sound a cock makes
definition[2]: if a cock crows, it makes a loud high sound
definition[3]: to talk about what you have done in a very proud way â€“ used to show disapproval
example[0]: He was crowing over winning the bet.
definition[4]: if someone, especially a baby, crows, they make a noise that shows they are happy
example[1]: Ben rushed to his father, crowing with pleasure.
